profile.message: This site serves as a design with the dual role of a portfolio site. Therefore, there are some non-functional features (placeholders), and if there has been any misunderstanding that they are not working correctly, I apologize. The main purpose is to post tweets or share new contents created as a hobby. â€»This sentence might sound a bit unnatural as it has been translated from Japanese to English using chatbot GPT-3.5!

whisper.text: To cleanse my worldly desires, I resolved to perform 108 full swings! However, I ran out of strength on the 30th swing. 98 desires remained uncleansed. That's just how reality is, I suppose.
New Year's is cold, so it's easy to find yourself snuggled up in a kotatsu, eating away. Welcome to 2024, I hope it's a great year!
